sentences.sContent: In this case, I genuinely believe in the Buddhist way of thinking.
sentences.sCn: 在这种情况下，我真诚地相信佛教徒的思维方式。

sentences.sContent: Up and down, up and down. Up and down with the Buddhist in the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.
sentences.sCn: 他就是这样做的：常任秘书长和外交部的佛教徒搭着电梯上上下下，好几个来回。

sentences.sContent: It strikes the Buddhist that if he were a force of evil in the world, then he would be afraid of himself.
sentences.sCn: 佛教徒突然想到，如果他是宇宙间的一股邪恶势力，那么他应该害怕他自己才对。

trans.tranOther: A Buddhist is a person whose religion is Buddhism
Buddhist means relating or referring to Buddhism
